short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Optimized Transient Whitelisting for Hacker Deterrent Pro.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: HDP-Express communicates with the Hacker Deterrent Pro security system.  HDP-Express tells the security system which webpages you have open and it tells the security the names of the sites that these pages pull content from.  The Hacker Deterrent Pro security system only allows your browser to talk to these sites; and it blocks all other browser traffic (protecting you from trojans that inject themselves the Chrome browser).  This plugin requires the installation of the Hacker Deterrent Pro security system, which is available at https://terraprivacy.com.
